title: 2 true bedroom / 2-bathroom apartment in Long Island City
posting_body: ['Lease assignment/transfer available from Aug 30th.', 'We are moving out of the city and 3 months left in our current lease.', 'We could not terminate our current lease, instead, the apartment management has agreed for us to find new tenants.', 'The new tenants will sign a new 1-year lease directly with the management.', "Move-in requirements are first month's rent and security deposit.", 'Our apartment is a luxury 2 true bedroom 2-bathroom apartment on the riverfront of Long Island City.', '$5368 monthly rent, no additional fee.', 'This rent is below current rates for the area/building as we have an older lease (to compare with current rates you could check <URL> website which is the apartment management).', 'Floor to ceiling double panel windows on south and west, a lot of natural lighting and city views.', 'It is almost 1200 sq feet, it is the largest 2-bedroom in the floor plan.', 'Living area and bedroom are very spacious (see the photos).', 'Kitchen is renovated with granite countertop and new stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and microwave.', 'Laundry in the unit.', 'With views of Manhattan skyline.', 'A full-service building (4545 Center Blvd) in LIC including 24-hour concierge/doorman, fully equipped fitness center with yoga room, residents lounge with WiFi, big screen TVs, and billiards table.', 'Roof deck is furnished and has a park, 2 Tennis courts, 1 volleyball court, barbecue grills, kids playground, kids playroom, and panoramic views of Manhattan, Brooklyn and Queens.', 'Pet friendly.']
